CustomField.description: Automatically identifies luxury properties based on criteria
CustomField.formula: OR( Listing_Price__c > 1000000, AND(Price_Per_SqFt__c > 500, Square_Footage__c > 3000), Pool__c = TRUE && Square_Footage__c > 4000, Garage_Spaces__c >= 3 && Square_Footage__c > 3500 )
CustomField.label: Is Luxary Property
